function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of transparent and credible information for reducing covid-19 related travel risks.","category":"Transparency and Accountability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq sensor nodes connected to the internet potentially vulnerable to cyberattacks","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cloud services
